{"id":1811867427,"question_id":4083,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1761451982,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"914 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1811867427/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Stable Subarrays With Equal Boundary and Interior Sum","memory":"293.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long countStableSubarrays(vector<int>& capacity) {\n        int N = (int)capacity.size();\n\n        long long pref = 0;\n        long long ans = 0;\n        unordered_map<string, vector<int>> m;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            auto& l = m[to_string(capacity[i]) + \"#\" + to_string(pref - 2*capacity[i])];\n            int cnt = 0;\n            for (int j=(int)l.size()-1; j>=0; j--) {\n                if ((i+1) - l[j] >= 3)\n                    break;\n                cnt++;\n            }\n            ans += (int)l.size() - cnt;\n            \n            m[to_string(capacity[i]) + \"#\" + to_string(pref)].push_back(i);\n            pref += capacity[i];\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"stable-subarrays-with-equal-boundary-and-interior-sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1297}
